Action.author: bestbeforetoday
Action.body: ~harrisob@us.ibm.com Â I think you've already merged most (if not all) of the changes required for this

Action.author: bestbeforetoday
Action.body: The capability provided by the fabric-client module has been reimplemented in a new API within the fabric-common module. There will not be a version 2.0 release of fabric-client. Client applications are encouraged to use the higher level APIs provided by the fabric-network module where possible.
